pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Sproutling, 1 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 2 Diamonds, 1 Empty Premium Packet, 400 Sun value.

pages.title: Bruiser
pages.text: $(#25228d)Bananasaurus Rexes bite Zombies quickly and spills banana peels.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Tall. Each bite increases bite speed and Banana Peel amount. Throws up to 6 Banana Peels when there's no zombie within bite range.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Bananasaurus may look big and scary, but she's really sweet.
